preqs: One first-year Arts unit and one Gateway unit in Literary studies

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ACL1%, AEH1%, AMU1%, ASA1%, ATS1%, AZA1%} and  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS1903, ATS1904})

description: The unit introduces students to texts from other cultures and/or to texts that thematise cross-cultural encounters. In this way, students will engage with literary works that introduce readers to other cultures' ways of life; raise issues specific to particular cultural contexts; use language in culturally-specific ways and/or take cross-cultural encounters as a thematic focus of the text.
